definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
to reply (to an accusation)/to defend one's dissertation
to answer questions (as teacher or consultant)/to clarify doubts

sentences.english: “The answer is to get more data, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 這是需要更多數據資料來回答的。

sentences.english: Fascinated, my eyes reverting from the south, dropt, to follow those.
sentences.chinese: 令人着迷，目轉南方答之不及，低，那些落葉。

sentences.english: Don't answer these questions in a list-like fashion!
sentences.chinese: 不要用一個列清單的方式來回答這些問題。

sentences.english: Jupiter, to stop questions, replied that it was a fresh creation from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 朱庇特唯恐她再追問下去就答說這是大地的新造物。

sentences.english: I upxed your response. One thing however - Russia China and …. Murica?
sentences.chinese: 我來回答你，有件事，俄羅斯，中國和美國？

sentences.english: The examiners can pitch on any student to answer questions.
sentences.chinese: 主考人可以指定任何一個學生來回答問題。

sentences.english: Well, we can answer that. The chain rule is something like this.
sentences.chinese: 可以用鏈式法則來回答這個問題。
風馳，請你來回答這個問題。

sentences.english: Unless they have a very, very good memory, they will not.
sentences.chinese: 除非他們記性非常好，否則他們答不出來。

sentences.english: So I questioned by your Chaplain-like eyes, I could not answer.
sentences.chinese: 以至於你的眼睛秋水般地呻問我的時候，我沒有答。

sentences.english: The questions were answered by students in class yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 在昨天的課堂上，問題被學生答出。

sentences.english: All right. Who would like to reply?
May we be ready to answer those who would question our faith.
sentences.chinese: 願我們常作準備，來回答別人對我們信心的疑問。

sentences.english: Clearly, Wadeson did’t want her listeners to actually respond.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，威德森不想讓她的聽衆真的來回答她的問題。

sentences.english: I can answer in one word, It is victory.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用一個詞來回答，那就是勝利。

sentences.english: Answer them by recommitting with energy and determination to our work.
sentences.chinese: 請用充滿鬥志和決心的工作來回答他們。

definition: variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
